verbs.description: Stone [V: has] been a longtime political advisor to President Trump , who played a key role in the 2016 election , and as well as former business partner of Paul Manafort .
[ARG1: Stone] has [V: been] [ARG2: a longtime political advisor to President Trump , who played a key role in the 2016 election , and as well as former business partner of Paul Manafort] .
Stone has been a longtime political advisor to [ARG0: President Trump] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: played] [ARG1: a key role in the 2016 election] , and as well as former business partner of Paul Manafort .
